summary: dan and phil and the sounds they make in bed - - during foreplay dan is loud. his movements are exaggerated and theatrical much...

dan and phil and the sounds they make in bed

-

- during foreplay dan is loud. his movements are exaggerated and theatrical much like they are usually. he moans loudly as phil jerks him off, throws his head back as phil takes him his mouth, and whines as phil rims him

- his vocabulary is narrowed down to swear words, enthusiastic assenting, and phil’s name

- however, his breath hitches when phil bites his neck. he goes completely pliant, basically melting into phil and whimpering softly while phil bites and sucks and licks the sensitive skin

- when dan is blowing phil he likes to pull out all the stops. he accompanies his rather skilful sucking abilities with soft hums against phil to make his cock twitch. he likes to moan with a full mouth and make pornographic slurping noises because he’s extra like that

- when dan is being fucked, he doesn’t moan as much. there’s a lot more grunting and uh uh uhs and he can rarely say any words other than phil’s name

- when dan is fucking phil, he’s louder. his moans are drawn out and he swears a lot and he loves telling phil how good he feels

- phil is relatively quieter. he lets out low grunts and moans but he’s not nearly as loud as dan is

- phil, however, is a lot more talkative. it started when they first met and dan was young and nervous about having sex so phil would talk him through it and praise him and reassure him 

- it slowly developed into a bit of a habit when phil realised how much dan got off on the praise and when dan admitted that he loved nothing more than phil’s deep, smooth voice sounding absolutely wrecked when they’re having sex

- when dan is sucking phil off, he winds his hands in dan’s curls and groans while telling him how much he loves his mouth. he praises dan for being a good boy and making him feel so good

- phil is a lot louder when he’s bottoming. he jokes about how there’s something about having a cock in his ass that makes him moan so much and makes him forget to talk

-

the end is a bit ehh but i hope u liked this! pls send me some kinky prompts <3

blog.name: danilandpudd
blog.title: Phan Posts
blog.description:
Hi there! Welcome to my Tumblr blog on Dan and Phil! On here I will be posting all sorts of things, from silly pictures and videos to quotes from the pair of them, twice, or even three times, every day. I have enabled questions and submissions; they are much appreciated (i will give credit if you submit). My direct messages are open to anyone that I follow. I hope you enjoy scrolling through my page!

IG: tlmw_vs
PicsArt: aesthetic_hxwell

body:
Oneshot requests!

So i have nothing better to do with my existence. I have been writing a lot lately and thought I would give this a shot!

I will be taking requests and will write it. Give me the two characters and your prompt! This is simply for fun, so please ask away! The fandoms I will write about will be in the tags, but I will add them here too!

Fandoms include Vlog squad, Shane and friends, Monster Prom, Daniel Howell, Phil Lester, South Park, Camp Camp, Twenty one pilots, panic at the Disco, Fall Out boy and more!

summary: I was in a pretty bad crash recently and we've just done a ton of driving and I'm all shaky and weird feeling, can you tell me...
question: I was in a pretty bad crash recently and we've just done a ton of driving and I'm all shaky and weird feeling, can you tell me some soft things about dnp to take my mind off it?
answer:
i’m so sorry darling, i hope you feel better soon 💕

- dan and phil are HUGE dorks who will do anything to make the other smile or laugh

- phil bought dan a fancy-ass like £120 candle or something

- phils aunt made and named one of her knitted hats after dan!!!

- dan and phil are heavily involved in every aspect of their lives (including running a business together) and yet they still actively choose to spend their free time with each other and vacation with each other and phils family :’)

- despite the “empire” built up around them and their fame from youtube, their relationship has always been strong and healthy

- not 2 b dramatic but phil literally saved dan’s ass when he was in uni!!!! without phil that poor boy never would’ve done laundry :’)

- and phil probably always made sure to feed him his signature Scrambled Eggs 👌

- they know literally everything about each other??? gross. unrealistic. yet here they are

- and they’re so supportive of each other even when the other isn’t involved!!! phil was so excited for dan’s Supergamers doc that he was part of!!!! dan repped phils solo merch!!! SUPPORT!!!!!

- phil literally got to watch dan grow up from a scrawny little 18 year old from Reading to a strong and successful 27 year old man living in London

- have you heard either of them make jokes about being single in the last decade? 👀🌚

- they know the other is gonna be in their future. like when they did the mince pie codex so they knew what to get the follow year for christmas time??? “this isn’t a forever home” “‘you should get a dog’ yeah phils really fond of a corgi”

- they are literally each other’s biggest fan and supporter. dan helped phil make truth bombs and 7 second challenge a reality. phil gave dan those sweet Editing Tips and helped him get started on youtube. they supported each other when they both wanted to make solo merch and branch off slightly from their joint branding. phils been super supportive of dan’s youtube break and dan’s paying £5 a month to themselves phil just to be a member to his channel which is something a lot of people weren’t really fond of???

- they’re literally just so fucking in love and they love and admire each other so much
